Tanya

----- Original Message -----
From: Marcia Lambert
To: 0-homeschoolreviews@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, May 20, 2001 4:42 PM
Subject: [hs reviews] FREE Used Textbooks


TEXTBOOK RESOURCE
Insights
<http://www.emcd.net/homeschool/freebook.htm for more information>
Insights offers FREE School books. Yes, FREE. Used school textbooks
available free to homeschooling families. See

I've gotten tons of used textbooks from them. We don't always use them as intended - I use an assortment of textbooks on a single subject and build my own scope and sequence (always worrying about those 'gaps'). And we use them for pictures (timeline pictures and tracing) and reference material.

The company is in South Carolina. You can either drive there, or have them shipped. They charge you only what they actually pay for bookrate shipping. (VERY VERY CHEAP) Check back frequently as the selection changes often.

--Marcia in Georgia
